Text.val: Author: Stephan Huppertz
03.07.2014 GB SCR19001 Extended initialization with ADMN_TESTCLIENTS = N
23.04.2014 JH SCR18848 Added button handled
05.03.2013 JH SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
30.10.2012 SH SCR17654 Changed CLNA_URGENT to be modifiable
04.04.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
12.03.2012 SH SCR17116 Removed test on modify permission to enabale button List
21.12.2011 SH SCR16974 Added new BAD001 parameters
22.07.2011 SH SCR16620 Added button Recreate
18.05.2011 SH SCR16448 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY
23.03.2010 SH SCR15405 If GNRL_CODE= 'PL' then no initial update of checkbox
-- Both variables are set in the Initialization part of OAD320 and used
in the further processes to select CLNA
-- Shortcut labels
-- Get separate permission
... for button Release
... for button Recreate
-- Shortcut handling
-- CLNA rows, which are finally transferred to banks, are not
-- Initialization for further handling (only once at program start)
-- Button Advice
-- Button Leder bookings
-- Button Prepare fiels
-- Button List
-- Button Generate files
-- Initializations (batch)
-- First cleanup the temp trable
-- Then set CLNA_ACTIVEUSER to lock the CLNA rows
1. for other users
2. to have a fixed set of CLNA rows (to avoid problems if CLNA rows
are added by other programs, in the meanwhile of the active OAD320
session
-- Finally populate temp table for the use on the first screen
-- Display a screen where the users are able to decide manually
for which set of CLNA rows (CLNA_ADMN and CLNA_HGRP_CODE) they want
to continue
-- Prepare range string for ADMNO and HGRP_CODE for further selections on CLNA
and set CLNA_ACTIVEUSER = blank for CLNA rows which are unchecked on the screen
-- Button Release
... re-initialize the temp table
-- Button Recreate
... re-initialize the temp table
-- Button Handled

SQL_STMT_U.val: update :1/CLNA set CLNA_ACTIVEUSER = ':2' where CLNA_CLIENTCHARGED = 'Y' and CLNA_TRANSFERRED = 'N' and CLNA_AADVANCE > 0 and CLNA_ACTIVEUSER = '' and exists (select * from :1/ADMU where ADMU_ADMNO = CLNA_ADMNO and ADMU_HUSR_ID = ':2' and ADMU_ALLOW_CREATE_BANKFILES = 'Y') and exists (select * from :1/ADMN where ADMN_NO = CLNA_ADMNO and ADMN_TESTCLIENTS = 'N')

select CLNA_ADMNO, CLNA_HGRP_CODE, COUNT(*) as COUNT from :1/CLNA where CLNA_CLIENTCHARGED = 'Y' and CLNA_TRANSFERRED = 'N' and CLNA_AADVANCE > 0 and CLNA_ACTIVEUSER = ':2' and exists (select * from :1/ADMU where ADMU_ADMNO = CLNA_ADMNO and ADMU_HUSR_ID = ':2' and ADMU_ALLOW_CREATE_BANKFILES = 'Y') and exists (select * from :1/ADMN where ADMN_NO = CLNA_ADMNO and ADMN_TESTCLIENTS = 'N') group by CLNA_ADMNO, CLNA_HGRP_CODE order by CLNA_ADMNO, CLNA_HGRP_CODE for fetch only

Text.val: ... get string of users who locks CLNA rows, to message box

SQL_STMT_U.val: select CLNA_ACTIVEUSER from :1/CLNA where CLNA_CLIENTCHARGED = 'Y' and CLNA_TRANSFERRED = 'N' and CLNA_AADVANCE > 0 and CLNA_ACTIVEUSER <> '' and exists (select * from :1/ADMU where ADMU_ADMNO = CLNA_ADMNO and ADMU_HUSR_ID = ':2' and ADMU_ALLOW_CREATE_BANKFILES = 'Y') and exists (select * from :1/ADMN where ADMN_NO = CLNA_ADMNO and ADMN_TESTCLIENTS = 'N') group by CLNA_ACTIVEUSER order by CLNA_ACTIVEUSER for fetch only

Text.val: -- At least one row must be selecetd

SQL_STMT_U.val: update :1/CLNA set CLNA_ACTIVEUSER = '' where CLNA_CLIENTCHARGED = 'Y' and CLNA_TRANSFERRED = 'N' and CLNA_AADVANCE > 0 and CLNA_ACTIVEUSER <> '' and exists (select * from :1/ADMU where ADMU_ADMNO = CLNA_ADMNO and ADMU_HUSR_ID = ':2' and ADMU_ALLOW_CREATE_BANKFILES = 'Y') and exists (select * from :1/ADMN where ADMN_NO = CLNA_ADMNO and ADMN_TESTCLIENTS = 'N')

Text.val: -- CLNA_ACTIVEUSER is set to blank via DSQL, see SQL command box
@Temp table is immed cleaned up
... set CLNA_ACTIVEUSER = blank for rows which are unchecked on the

SQL_STMT_U.val: update :1/CLNA set CLNA_ACTIVEUSER = '' where CLNA_ADMNO = :3 and CLNA_HGRP_CODE = ':4' and CLNA_CLIENTCHARGED = 'Y' and CLNA_TRANSFERRED = 'N' and CLNA_AADVANCE > 0 and CLNA_ACTIVEUSER = ':2' and exists (select * from :1/ADMU where ADMU_ADMNO = CLNA_ADMNO and ADMU_HUSR_ID = ':2' and ADMU_ALLOW_CREATE_BANKFILES = 'Y') and exists (select * from :1/ADMN where ADMN_NO = CLNA_ADMNO and ADMN_TESTCLIENTS = 'N')

Text.val: -- Variables for tabular view (sorted by tab order)
-- Variables outside of tabular view
-- The screen with Totals per bank has to be refreshed if the bank data
of the previous CLNA row was changed
... auto. update of file type and settlement
... auto. update of file type and settlement
... screen refresh to achieve also a screen refresh for screen with totals
per bank
-- Set error code = 0 if bank file type is set to 0, advances has to be handled
... auto. update of file type and settlement
... auto. update of file type and settlement
... screen refresh to achieve also a screen refresh for screen with totals
per bank
... auto. update if bank bank admin or ledger number is changed
-- Not allowed to delete if costs not charged
-- Deletion is possible
... re-open OAD320, because the 'deleted' row is no longer
part of the current CLNA range

SQL_STMT_U.val: select CLNA_BANK_ADMNO, CLNA_BANK_LEDG_NO, min(BANK_NAME), CLNA_CURRENCY, cast(sum(CLNA_AADVANCE) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CLNA left outer join :1/BANK on BANK_ADMNO = CLNA_BANK_ADMNO and BANK_LEDG_NO = CLNA_BANK_LEDG_NO where CLNA_CLIENTCHARGED = 'Y' and CLNA_TRANSFERRED = 'N' and CLNA_AADVANCE > 0 and CLNA_ACTIVEUSER = ':2' and CLNA_ADMNO in (:3) and CLNA_HGRP_CODE in (:4) group by CLNA_BANK_ADMNO, CLNA_BANK_LEDG_NO, CLNA_CURRENCY order by CLNA_BANK_ADMNO, CLNA_BANK_LEDG_NO, CLNA_CURRENCY for fetch only

select cast(sum(CLNA_AADVANCEH) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CLNA where CLNA_CLIENTCHARGED = 'Y' and CLNA_TRANSFERRED = 'N' and CLNA_AADVANCE > 0 and CLNA_ACTIVEUSER = ':2' and CLNA_ADMNO in (:3) and CLNA_HGRP_CODE in (:4) for fetch only

select cast(sum(CLNA_AADVANCEH) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CLNA where CLNA_CLIENTCHARGED = 'Y' and CLNA_TRANSFERRED = 'N' and CLNA_AADVANCE > 0 and CLNA_ACTIVEUSER = ':2' and CLNA_ADMNO in (:3) and CLNA_HGRP_CODE in (:4) and CLNA_APPROVALDATEDEPTMNGR = ':5' for fetch only

Text.val: -- Check admin and ledger number of bank, both fields could be set to 0
on screen
... auto reset of wrong entered bank data
-- Check bank file type
... auto reset of wrong entered bank data
-- Check settlement code
... auto reset of wrong entered bank data
-- Set trigger to refresh the screen with totals pewr bank if CLNA_BANK_ADMNO or
CLNA_BANK_LEDG_NO is changed
-- Reset variables
-- Try to fetch a ledger number from COUNTRY_BANK
... with ADMN_ADMNOGLPACKAGE, CLNA_BANKCOUNTRY, CLNA_CURRENCY
... if not exists with ADMN_ADMNOGLPACKAGE, CLNA_BANKCOUNTRY
... if not exists with ADMN_ADMNOGLPACKAGE
-- Only if a ledger number was found in CTBA, use this to update CLNA
-- Obtain BANK for update on CLNA_BANKFILETYPE

SQL_STMT_U.val: update :1/CLNA set CLNA_ACTIVEUSER = '' where CLNA_CLIENTCHARGED = 'Y' and CLNA_TRANSFERRED = 'N' and CLNA_AADVANCE > 0 and CLNA_ACTIVEUSER = ':2' and exists (select * from :1/ADMU where ADMU_ADMNO = CLNA_ADMNO and ADMU_HUSR_ID = ':2' and ADMU_ALLOW_CREATE_BANKFILES = 'Y')
